### Graphing Parameters

```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
 pickerInput(
  inputId = "x_plotting",
  label = "Select X-Axis",
  choices = colnames(raw_data),
  options = list(`actions-box` = TRUE, size = 15,
    `selected-text-format` = "count > 3"), multiple = FALSE),
 pickerInput(
  inputId = "y_plotting",
  label = "Select Y-Axis",
  choices = colnames(raw_data),
  options = list(`actions-box` = TRUE, size = 15,
    `selected-text-format` = "count > 3"), multiple = FALSE)
 
) 
```
